## Relevant metadata standards

[ISA-Tab](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/isa-tab.html)

[MIBBI (Minimum Information for Biological and Biomedical Investigations)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/mibbi-minimum-information-biological-and-biomedical-investigations.html)

[NeXus](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/nexus.html)

[OME-XML (Open Microscopy Environment XML)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/ome-xml-open-microscopy-environment-xml.html)

[PDBx/mmCIF (Protein Data Bank Exchange Dictionary and the Macromolecular Crystallographic Information Framework)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/pdbx-mmcif.html)

[CIF (Crystallographic Information Framework)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/cif-crystallographic-information-framework.html)

[QuDEx (Qualitative Data Exchange Format)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/qudex-qualitative-data-exchange-format.html)

[SDMX (Statistical Data and Metadata Exchange)](http://rd-alliance.github.io/metadata-directory/standards/sdmx-statistical-data-and-metadata-exchange.html)
